event.title: Located slightly more than 100 miles (160 km) by road from Boston, it is a summer

data.event: Located slightly more than 100 miles (160 km) by road from Boston, it is a summer vacation community just south of the northern tip of Cape Cod, in an area known as the "Outer Cape".
Over half of the land area of the town is part of the Cape Cod National Seashore, established in 1961 by President John F. Kennedy, and administered by the U.S. National Park Service.

event.title: thousands of years before Europeans arrived

data.event: Cape Cod was the territory of succeeding cultures of indigenous peoples for thousands of years before Europeans arrived.
